tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE natural_disasters (
  disaster_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disaster_type VARCHAR(255),
  location_geography GEOGRAPHY,
  impact_severity INT,
  date_occurred DATE
)

CREATE TABLE NaturalDisasterImpactData (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  disaster_type VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  date_occurred DATE,
  severity INT
);

CREATE TABLE DisasterAffectingPopulation (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  population_size INT,
  homeless_count INT,
  injured_count INT,
  displaced_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE DisasterImpactAnalysis (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
  area_affected VARCHAR(255),
  estimated_loss DECIMAL(20, 2),
  recovery_efforts TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE natural_disaster_impact (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  disaster_type VARCHAR(50),
  severity INT,
  impact_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE disaster_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
)

CREATE TABLE disaster_severity_levels (
  severity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  severity_level VARCHAR(20),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE disaster_types (
  type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disaster_type VARCHAR(50),
  category VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE natural_disaster (  id INT PRIMARY KEY,  type STRING,  location STRING,  severity INT,  date DATE );  CREATE TABLE population_density (  id INT PRIMARY KEY,  location STRING,  density INT );  CREATE TABLE impact_analysis (  id INT PRIMARY KEY,  disaster_id INT,  population_density_id INT,  estimated_impact STRING );  CREATE TABLE disaster_prediction (  id INT PRIMARY KEY,  disaster_type STRING,  prediction_confidence INT );  CREATE TABLE spatial_distribution (  id INT PRIMARY KEY,  disaster_id INT,  latitude FLOAT,  longitude FLOAT );
